parameters.name: P
parameters.comment: Sets the downsampling ratio default: 0.75 (of original)

parameters.name: H
parameters.comment: Determines the width of the trellis (use 0 for chain; use _1 for a square trellis, i.e., width of sqrt(number of labels)).

parameters.name: L
parameters.comment: Determines the neighbourhood density (the number of neighbours for each node in the trellis). CAUTION: no default found

parameters.name: X
parameters.comment: The dependency heuristic to use in rearranging the trellis (None by default).

parameters.name: I
parameters.comment: The total number of iterations. default: 1000

parameters.name: Ic
parameters.comment: The number of collection iterations. default: 100

parameter.name: X
parameter.comment: The way to measure dependencies. default: lbf (frequencies only)
